activities: International SOS Government Services, Inc. provides medical assistance and healthcare support services to government organizations.  For that purpose, International SOS Government Services Inc., may collect information related to health used only for the purpose of rendering assistance.  Personal information is collected directly from individuals when they choose to provide to International SOS Government Services, Inc., their personal information by subscribing to products or services sold by International SOS Government Services, Inc.
